title: A Vida Sobre Rodas - Life On Wells (2011) Subtitles Pt-BR, Eng,
description:
"Life On Wheels" tells the story of the brazilian skating in recent decades through depositions and maneuvers of the four largest national idols today: Bob Burnquist, Cristiano Mateus, Lincoln Ueda and Sandro Dias. Testimonials and pictures of skaters, journalists and businessmen form a set that depicts the obstacles overcome by skate today so this second most practiced sport in the country. "Life On Wheels" is a film of many stories, but, above all, the trajectory of young people, often with nothing in common other than a passion for skateboarding, which transformed the sport in the Brazil.
Subtitles: Portuguese (Brazil), English, Spanish
